# beginDocument()

**Instance Method**

Invoked at the beginning of the printing session, this method sets up the current graphics context.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor func beginDocument()
```

## Discussion

Note that this method may be invoked in a subthread.

Override it to configure printing related settings. You should store your settings in the object returned by `NSPrintInfo`’s [doc://com.apple.appkit/documentation/AppKit/NSPrintInfo/shared] class method, which is guaranteed to return an instance specific to the thread in which you invoke this method. If you override this method, call the superclass implementation.

## Writing Conforming Rendering Instructions

- **endDocument()**: This method is invoked at the end of the printing session.
- **endPage()**: Writes the end of a conforming page.
